title: Obama Keynote Address - evaluate written source

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, C, and D. Describe one cause of the advance in Black political representation evident in the source. Describe one specific example of Black political leadership before 2004. Explain how the author’s life experience may have influenced his description of the United States. Explain how economic growth in Black communities was hindered or promoted in the second half of the twentieth century.

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, C, and D. Describe one cause of the advance in Black political representation evident in the source. Describe one specific example of Black political leadership before 2004. Explain how the author’s life experience may have influenced his description of the United States. Explain how economic growth in Black communities was hindered or promoted in the second half of the twentieth century.

topic.text: 4.15: Economic Growth and Black Political Representation

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
